Title: Create Avengers Archive folder structure
Body:
Create the initial folder structure for the Avengers Archive site.

**Requirements:**
- Create folders: /pictures /css /js /assets /fonts
- Add a .gitkeep file in each folder (so empty folders are tracked by git)
- Create index.html with basic HTML5 boilerplate

This establishes the foundation for all visual components.

Title: Create base HTML with semantic structure and meta tags
Body:
Create index.html with modern HTML5 semantic elements.

**Requirements:**
- Proper DOCTYPE; charset UTF-8; meta viewport for responsive
- Semantic structure: <header> with <nav>; <main> with <section>s; <aside>; <footer>
- Title: 'Avengers Archive - Classified Intelligence Database'
- Meta description about S.H.I.E.L.D. intelligence archive
- Open Graph tags for social sharing

**Depends on:** #1 (folder structure)

Title: Add CSS reset and Avengers theme variables
Body:
Create foundation CSS files for consistent styling.

**Requirements:**
- Create /css/reset.css with modern CSS reset (box-sizing; margin/padding reset)
- Create /css/variables.css with CSS custom properties:
  - --primary-red: #C8102E; --shield-blue: #0057B8; --arc-reactor: #00D4FF
  - --hulk-green: #6AC259; --gold: #FFD700; --dark-bg: #1a1a1a; --text-light: #f0f0f0

- Link both in index.html <head>

**Depends on:** #2 (HTML structure)

Create page navigation sidebar.

Set up JavaScript foundation.

Implement mobile navigation.

Title: Create lazy loading with Intersection Observer

Optimize image loading performance.

- Disconnect observer after load

Bring animations to life on scroll.

- Stagger child animations with delay

**Requirements:**
- Game loop: setInterval or requestAnimationFrame
- Gravity: piece falls automatically (interval: 1000ms / level)
- Game state object: score; level; lines; isPaused; isGameOver
